page.title: 17THE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: They are 12 councillors including the chairman John Warne,but not including the treasurer,who is the only paid member. They meet once a month,and discuss village plans.The main thing they discuss is planning permission for extensions etc.The council is planning to put up more street lights. The village hall is being rebuilt, with free labour from the Manpower services Commission,the Government pays for the labour ,all the village pays for is the materials. The council are also responsible for the upkeep of the footpaths and the playing fields.
